name: banco-fullstack
description: Aplicación completa Frontend + Backend para BDV

scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others --prefix "[{name}]" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: npx concurrently --kill-others --prefix "[{name}]" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.kill: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || echo No hay procesos Node.js ejecutándose
scripts.clean: npm run kill && npm run install:all
